text:
FarmLogs (YC '12) | Senior Backend Engineer | Ann Arbor, MI | ONSITE, REMOTE & CONTRACT | farmlogs.com/jobs

FarmLogs is on a mission to invent the future of farming. We're transforming the oldest and most significant industry in the world from gut instinct to data science. Our platform already exposes critical operational insights to 1 of every 3 farms in the U.S. and our users absolutely love us.

As a senior member of our backend team, you will be designing and building API's that connect farmers to a wide range of data sets - precipitation, heat, satellite image, soil, telematics, seed and fertilizer data, financial data and much more. You will collaborate with our with sales, marketing and data science to engineer problems into solutions to increase profitability and yield for a farmer.

Must Have's:

- 6+ Years Professional Engineering Experience

- Proficient in Python + Postgres. Familiarity with Clojure is nice.

-You enjoy writing clean, testable and modular software.

- You're pragmatic, keep it simple, and know how to choose the right tool for the job.

Apply at https://farmlogs.com/jobs/senior-backend-engineer-(regular-o...

Reach out to mwhalen at farmlogs.com with questions.
